OOC: Um, hey, I kinda forget Decapitron's orders, I searched the archive an=
d couldn't find them, so, Jer, tell me what Decapitron was ordered to do by=
 Megatron, and I'll be doing it.  Also, sorry I haven't been posting.

::Qu=
atro/Cutthroat/Triggerhappy/Bodicons::

     Quatro walked into the CF(he w=
as right outside it by the way) and looked around for his "escorts."  He ha=
d his plasma-wave rifle in hand, just in case this was a trap.  
~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Cutthroat landed down by Autofire.

=
     "Cutthroat here!  Cutthroat want attack Autobot idiots!" Cuttroat said=
.(BTW, Autobot referring to Maximals, not Autofire.)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Triggerhappy landed away from the CF, so that hi=
s engines didn't attract noise, then he transformed into robot mode and ran=
 near the CF.  He was alone where he was near the CF, so he was being extra=
 careful not to get detected by scanners.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~
      Now, Explobody was putting forth all his might to carry th=
e other three Bodicons!  Legtrap, a mole, was on his back.  Gutclaw, a velo=
ciraptor, was hanging onto one of his wings, and this was causing Explobody=
 to slightly lose his balance.  And finally, Headshot, a leopard, was hangi=
ng onto his little leg.  Explobody desperately flapped his wings.

     "Al=
most...there," Explobody panted.

      Then, Explobody descended by the CF=
.  When they got lower, Gutclaw and Headshot jumped off.  Cutthroat landed =
on his feet, and then Legtrap got off.  All 4 of them transformed to robot =
mode.

      "This is going to be fun!!" Headshot whispered.

       Headsh=
ot saw a nearby bush.  He got behind it, and layed down on his stomach.  He=
 poked his sniper rifle through the bushes enough so that he could see clea=
rly through the scope, and snipe down some Maximals.  Gutclaw got behind a =
tree, and put his legs together and his arms flat at his side, so that he c=
ouldn't be seen behind the tree.  Legtrap cackled quietly, and evilly, to h=
imself.  He dug a hole.  Then, he jumped in.  Legtrap then shot a little be=
am, and filled in the whole.  Well, not really, but it projects a hologram =
of dirt and stuff as if the hole had never been dug.  Explobody was ready t=
o fire bombs at any moment.
